meanings.definition: An aircraft capable of vertical takeoff and landing that can convert from helicopter to airplane mode.
meanings.sent1: The convertiplane soared into the sky effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: I watched the convertiplane transition from helicopter to airplane mode.
meanings.sent3: The convertiplane decided to take a break and relax on the runway.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight like a convertiplane, smoothly transitioning from one phase to another.
meanings.sent5: The convertiplane's unique design allows it to perform amazing aerial maneuvers.

meanings.definition: To change or adapt to a new form or purpose.
meanings.sent1: He tried to convertiplane his old bicycle into a stationary exercise bike.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to convertiplane its business model to focus on online sales.
meanings.sent3: The chef attempted to convertiplane the traditional recipe by adding a modern twist.
meanings.sent4: She managed to convertiplane her hobby into a successful career.
meanings.sent5: The artist's creativity allowed him to convertiplane ordinary objects into extraordinary works of art.
